long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Consolidate all of the automatic email receipts from your purchases in one place to automatically track your budget. Currently just used for Metro purchases and can see all of the past expenses you have made to monitor your spending automatically.
